winning_offer: We Clone Your Best Dispatcher (AI Answers Funnel)
pain_points: Technicians sitting idle due to dispatch lag

objection_handlers.price_shock: A single missed AC install costs you $6k. This system saves 10 of those a month.
objection_handlers.robot_fear: Our AI uses 'Ultra Low Latency' and pauses like a human. Listen to this demo.

drip_sequence.subject: Fixing the 'Tardiness' reviews for {company_name}
drip_sequence.body: Saw the 1-star review. My AI can text clients instantly when techs are late. Want a demo?

drip_sequence.subject: Did you see this dispatch log?
drip_sequence.body: Here is a video of our AI dispatching a driver in 30 seconds. Your current process takes 10 mins. [Link]
Hey Mike, just saved a client $4k in lost leads this morning. You strictly opposed to growth?

drip_sequence.subject: Closing your file (Iceberg HVAC)
drip_sequence.body: Assuming you're good with the current lead loss rate. I'll focus on other HVAC ops in [City]. Last chance.
